testcase.classname: feature to test the user management
testcase.name: Verify search and reset functionality for user management in admin - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on Admin in sidepanel............................................passed Then User Management section is displayed...................................passed And the user makes a note of the total number of records for the users......passed When user search with search parameters for Admin, Admin, Paul M Collings and Enabled.passed And clicks on Search button.................................................passed Then the searched user is displayed with the (1) Record Found...............passed When the user clicks on Reset button........................................passed Then the search parameters values should be cleared.........................passed And All the records should be displayed.....................................passed
